mapper.select: select * from subject st join subj_type sj on st.type_code= sj.type_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = st.prof_no join open_subj os on os.subj_code = st.subj_code join registration rs on rs.open_sub_code = os.open_sub_code join student stu on stu.stu_no = rs.stu_no join subj_time s on rs.open_sub_code = s.open_sub_code join timetable t on t.timetable_code = s.timetable_code join classroom class on class.classroom_code = s.classroom_code join building b on b.building_code = class.building_code where stu.student_id=#{studentId}
